text:
@coachella @RATM thank goodness it is postponed
thousands of people would have gotten #covid19 and given it to their parents, aunts and uncles, grandparents who could have died https://t.co/iO1SQggyzX

entity.name: Coachella is officially rescheduled for October
entity.description: Both Coachella and Stagecoach music festivals have been rescheduled from April dates over COVID-19 concerns.
